column4: if i have two network interfaces actively connected to the internet, is there a way to set which one firefox will use?
the routing table sets what is used. if both have routes the smaller metric wins. so you can fine tune with the "route" command
do you know which route command specifically would determine this?
nah. i just know a bit how it works. i never had to set the metrics. but you will find out easily if you use a console and type "man route"
